underlying_goal: To improve the bash command logging hook (`auto_log.sh`) by implementing a dual-format (human-readable and JSONL) output, and then migrating old logs to the new format.
primary_success: Designed and implemented a dual-format logging system (human-readable and JSONL) for shell commands, providing both easy visual scanning and powerful programmatic querying.
brief_summary: The user wanted to improve shell command logging. Claude proposed and implemented a dual-logging system with a human-readable file and a JSONL file. After implementation, Claude also wrote and executed a script to migrate old logs to the new format.
